roleset.name: giving, offer, payment

role.descr: what the payment is for, might be total price or commodity

example.name: args 1, 2 and 3
example.text: the shipper must provide some substantive evidence of his tender of the item to the carrier beyond a mere claim

example.name: with arg3
example.text: his tender of $100 on the purchase price

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on internet exs, tender-v.01. No VNcls.

frameset.note: All our corpus examples for file creation were adjectival, so this frame is based on internet examples. Arg3 is based on internet usage, not tender-v.
